interactivity.to_get_this_event:
Have 10+ Haruka Lust before The Value of Sharing . 
Autoplays after " Kadrillionbilliontrillion " . This event is the final event in an event chain started from " The Value of Sharing " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 10 Lust before The Value of Sharing . Replaced by Fixing Pipes after seeing Kadrillionbilliontrillion .

progression.synopsis: Arriving at her apartment , Sensei spends some time with Haruka and Maki .
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on if Sensei pursued Sara during either Carry Me Home or A Mostly Empty Home .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p1.
